info.author: gutef
info.description:
This project offers 3 basic tools for manipulating binary files: 1) flexible
hexdump 2) hexencoder that reads a binary file and apply specific binary changes
at given offsets and 3) a binary compare that gives summary of ranges where
files differ
info.name: hexencoder
